missing_information: Exact amounts received from side jobs
Nature of side jobs (business or hobby)
Any expenses related to side jobs
interview_questions: Can you provide details about the side jobs you did, including the types of services you provided?
Do you have records of how much you earned from each side job throughout the year?
Did you incur any expenses for tools, materials, or transportation related to these side jobs?
Were these side jobs part of an ongoing business or just occasional work?
Can you provide the names and contact information of the people who paid you for these side jobs?
documentation_needed: Detailed records of side job income
Mileage logs if vehicle was used

missing_information: Medicare Part B premium amounts paid
Details of what insurance did/did not cover
interview_questions: Can you provide your Medicare Part B premium statements for the year?
Do you have documentation showing what portions of your medical expenses were covered by insurance?
Did you have any other medical expenses not included in these receipts, like mileage to medical appointments?
Were any of these medical expenses reimbursed by insurance or any other source?
Did you pay any long-term care insurance premiums or have any other qualifying medical expenses?

missing_information: Exact dates child lived at home
Information about support provided by other parent
interview_questions: Can you provide the exact dates Tyler lived with you versus at college during the tax year?
Do you have documentation showing you provided more than half of Tyler's total support for the year?
Can you provide receipts for tuition payments and other educational expenses you paid?
Did Tyler have any income of his own during the year?
Can you confirm that Tyler's mother did not claim him as a dependent on her tax return?
documentation_needed: Receipts for tuition and support expenses
Written statement about other parent's support

missing_information: Percentage of home used exclusively for business
Details of coffee shop work frequency
interview_questions: Can you provide written documentation from your employer requiring you to work from home?
What percentage of your home is used exclusively for your home office?
How often did you work from coffee shops versus your home office?
Do you have records of the exact dates you worked from home versus other locations?
Did your employer reimburse you for any of these home office expenses?

missing_information: Tax ID for Children's Hospital donation
interview_questions: Can you provide a detailed description and photos of the furniture you donated?
How did you determine the $2,000 value for the donated furniture?
Can you obtain a proper receipt from Goodwill with their tax ID number?
Can you get the tax ID number for Children's Hospital for their donation receipt?
Did you make any other charitable contributions not included in these receipts?
documentation_needed: Proper receipts with tax ID numbers
